```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
  vec_num <- c(1:100)

  k <- 1
  while(k <= 100) {    
    if(vec_num[k]%%3==0 || vec_num[k]%%5==0) {
      if(vec_num[k]%%3==0 && vec_num[k]%%5== 0) {
          print("FizzBuzz")
          k <- k + 1
        }
          else if(vec_num[k]%%5 == 0) {
            print("Buzz")
            k <- k + 1
          }
        else {
          print("Fizz")
          k <- k + 1
        }
    }
    
      else {
        print(vec_num[k])
        k <- k + 1          
      }

}
```
